alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 9:31AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cattaraugus, southern Erie and northeastern Chautauqua Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 931 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Collins, or 14 miles southwest of Hamburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause minor flooding. Locations impacted include... West Seneca, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Colden, Orchard Park, Gowanda, Blasdell, Angola, North Collins, Derby, East Concord, Evangola State Park, Angola on the Lake, North Boston, Concord and Collins. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 58 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie
